Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our courses and services

Are the courses free?

Yes, all our courses are completely free. We believe in making Islamic education accessible to everyone.

Do I need any prerequisites?

Most courses are designed for beginners, but some advanced courses may require prior knowledge. Check individual course descriptions for details.

How do I enroll in a course?

Simply click on any course and start learning immediately. No registration required for most courses.

Can I get a certificate?

Yes, we offer certificates of completion for most courses. Contact us for more information about certification.

Is there mobile support?

Yes, our platform is fully responsive and works great on mobile devices, tablets, and computers.

How can I contact instructors?

You can reach out to instructors through our contact form or by emailing us directly. We'll forward your message to the appropriate instructor.

WISE English Academy

Dedicated to providing free, high-quality Islamic education to students worldwide. Learn from qualified scholars and deepen your understanding of Islamic jurisprudence.
